alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 24 at 5:47AM AKST until December 27 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches, with localized amounts up to 15 inches, are possible. * WHERE...Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through late Sunday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 30 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
